text: hello my name is naveen narayan
specialist solutions architect for
amazon connect in this video i'd like to
talk about amazon connect wisdom and
show how wisdom can help your contact
center agents automatically receive
recommendations for knowledge based
articles which can help them quickly
understand and resolve customer issues
amazon connect is an easy to use omni
channel cloud contact center that helps
you provide customer service at a lower
cost
we found out that when an agent is on a
call with a customer they can lose
valuable time searching through their
organization knowledge base to try and
find content to solve customer issues
the time lost in searching through
documents is a confusing experience for
both the customer and an agent it
decreases the likelihood that the agent
would be able to understand and resolve
the issue and it also increases the
average call handle time which
ultimately increases the cost of the
call
we released wisdom in september 2021 to
address just this challenge
it's a feature of connect that
automatically delivers agents the
information they need
reducing the time spent in searching for
answers
behind the scene wisdom uses machine
learning and amazon connect contact lens
to transcribe the call in real time it
then automatically detects customer
concerns it searches connected
repositories and provides relevant
recommendations to the agents
agents can also simply enter a question
or phrase in their desktop application
such as
what is the pet policy in hotel rooms or
i'm having wi-fi issues with my laptop
and wisdom searches and returns the most
relevant information to handle the
customer issue
let me show you how this looks like
so in the following demo the customer
chris calls into an i.t help desk with
an issue about his laptop and he's
connected with an agent naveen
he then begins to explain
issues in connecting the laptop to the
internet you'll notice that as chris
speaks with naveen wisdom automatically
gets recommendations from the company's
knowledge base and serves them up to
help naveed identify and debug chris's
issues as you noticed the agent didn't
have to spend any time on searching
through documentation to try and debug
the issue the relevant links were
automatically suggested
wisdom comes with pre-built connectors
for salesforce servicenow and zendesk in
addition to robust apis to indust html
or plain text content from native
knowledge based repositories
once interested the knowledge content
can be accessed through amazon connect's
agent application or custom agent
applications that you might be using
the apis also allow you to encrypt the
content using a kms key and to specify
the sync frequency so content is always
fresh and relevant
that wraps up our demo of wisdom to
learn more about amazon connect and
wisdom please visit
aws.com forward slash connect or please
feel free to reach out to your aws sales
specialist thank you
